summary: Provides a comprehensive test suite for the CogVideoX video generation pipeline, including fast unit tests with lightweight dummy components to verify core features such as attention slicing, callback handling, fused QKV projections, inference consistency, batch processing, and VAE tiling, as well as integration tests that run the full pipeline on GPU to confirm end‑to‑end functionality and proper environment management.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability, and performance of the CogVideoX video generation pipeline by detecting regressions and validating key functionalities before deployment or release.
